text: Moga garir gumazir Moses nguazim getiasa amangiziba, men marazi eghaghanir ifavarim gamua ghaze, “Nguazir kam, a nguazir kuram.” Ezɨ men akar kam gumazamizibagh amizɨ, me imobir avɨrim Ikiavɨra Itir God gami. Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God arɨmariar kuram moga garir gumazir kabar amadazɨ, me zuamɨra ariaghire.
